name: Trick or Freak
description:
WARNING:  Crude humor. Sexually suggestive humor.  Flashing lights. ADULTS ONLY.

Your Halloween is interrupted when a mixture of stains and fate evoke a creature in your room! Assist in  bringing her to her true evoker, or simply see the sights.

Will YOU learn to hone your True Will in several locales , such as socially imposing concerts, authoritarian charity parks, or the bowels of an unthinkable creature?

Will YOU express yourself through magical crow candy which affect your skill progression?

Will YOU trick-or-treat within this door knocking SIMULATION ADVENTURE!?

INSTRUCTIONS AND ART BOOK INCLUDED.

PRODUCT OF SELF-IMPOSED HALLOWEEN GAME JAM.
